post.title: wtb: bnib sealed rogers iphone 3gs 16/32gb white - gta/cash only
post.content: i'm looking to pick this phone up asap. the sooner the better! must be sealed/new and locked to rogers. 16/32gb no preference but has to be white! pm or email - misra@rogers.blackberry.net text (dont call) - 416-294-1102 cheers!
